text: Ralph "Chad" Colley Jr (May 13, 1944 â€“ January 30, 2021) was an American para- alpine skier, army officer and activist for disabled Americans. He won a gold medal at the 1992 Paralympic Games. Colley was born in Fort Smith, Arkansas. Colley died on January 30, 2021 at the age of 76. ==References== Category:1944 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Military people from Arkansas Category:American activists Category:Paralympic gold medalists for the United States Category:Sportspeople from Arkansas Category:People from Fort Smith, Arkansas
title: Chad Colley
